text:
Location: London, UK

Company: http://www.podaris.com

We're a small startup which is aiming to change the way that cities are designed. We're not quite hiring, yet -- we're still seeking financing and will begin bootstrapping our first product later this month. If you're interested in what we're doing, then please do get in touch. We're using Meteor.js to implement a transport-planning-focused parametric CAD/GIS platform. If you're interested in urban design or transport planning -- or doing cutting-edge geospatial things with the latest web technology -- then drop us a line!
